column4: every once in a while, something weird happens on my ubuntu install where I cant ping localhost
i ran an /sbin/ifconfig and it showed that my external interface had no IP address, so I ran /etc/init.d/network restart, and now it does have an address, but I still cant ping localhost.
whenever this happens, rebooting seems to fix it, but I dont want to reboot to fix the issue.
